attributes.action: Legalize the right to grow cannabis for personal use.
attributes.additional_details:
The uk is falling down 
Government / economy  / peoples mental health 
By simply making cannabis legal then 
making licenses taxable this will help build back up the uk. More than half the population use cannabis. Start a petition / listen to the people of this country.
attributes.background:
It is time to legalize cannabis. 
Tax cannabis growers. The uk population that use cannabis has grew and is growing. Let's stop criminal gang making profits from cannabis. It is everywhere you go on the roads.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614503
